1P1h1o1t1o

1C1r1e1d1i1t1 1K1e1a1r1i1n1 1E1v1e1r1 1C2o1k1/1P1r1a2t1 1I1n1s1t1i1t1u1t1e
1I1 1t1a1u1g1h1t1 1m1y1 1f1i1r1s1t1 1c1l1a2s1 1a1t1 1C1o1l1u1m1b1i1a1 1U1n1i1v1e1r1s1i1t1y1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1M1.1F1.1A1.1 1p1r1o1g1r1a1m1 1t1h1i1s1 1m1o1n1t1h1,1 1a1n1d1 1e1v1e1n1 1t1h1o1u1g1h1 1I1‚1Ä1ô1v1e1 1b2e1n1 1t1e1a1c1h1i1n1g1 1c1o2l1e1g1e1 1w1r1i1t1i1n1g1 1s1i1n1c1e1 1129131,1 1I1 1i1n1i1t1i1a2l1y1 1f1e1l1t1 1a1 1l1i2t1l1e1 1i1n1t1i1m1i1d1a1t1e1d1 1b1y1 1t1h1e1 1s1c1h2o1l1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1r1e1g1a1l1 1c1a1m1p1u1s1.1 1T1h1a1t1,1 1a1n1d1 1r1e1g1r1e1t1f1u1l1.

1I1 1e1n1j1o1y1e1d1 1g1o1i1n1g1 1t1o1 1c1o2l1e1g1e1 1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1U1n1i1v1e1r1s1i1t1y1 1o1f1 1M1i1c1h1i1g1a1n1,1 1a1n1 1h1o1u1r1 1f1r1o1m1 1h1o1m1e1,1 1b1u1t1 1m1y1 1s1e1c1r1e1t1 1h1u1m1i1l1i1a1t1i1o1n1 1i1s1:1 1I1 1w1a1s1 1t1h1e1 1t1y1p1e1 1o1f1 1m1e1d1i1o1c1r1e1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1 1I1 1n1o1w1 1d1i1s1d1a1i1n1.1 1A1s1 1a1 1f1r1e1s1h1m1a1n1,1 1I1 1c1a1r1e1d1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1m1y1 1f1r1i1e1n1d1s1,1 1m1y1 1b1o1y1f1r1i1e1n1d1 1a1n1d1 1m1y1 1p1o1e1t1r1y1.1 1O1r1,1 1I1 1c1a1r1e1d1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1w1h1a1t1 1m1y1 1b1o1y1f1r1i1e1n1d1 1t1h1o1u1g1h1t1 1o1f1 1m1y1 1f1r1i1e1n1d1s1,1 1w1h1a1t1 1m1y1 1f1r1i1e1n1d1s1 1t1h1o1u1g1h1t1 1o1f1 1h1i1m1,1 1a1n1d1 1w1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1y1 1t1h1o1u1g1h1t1 1o1f1 1m1y1 1p1o1e1t1r1y1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1h1i1m1.1 1H1e1r1e1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1w1h1a1t1 1I1 1w1i1s1h1 1I1‚1Ä1ô1d1 1k1n1o1w1n1 1a1n1d1 1d1o1n1e1 1d1i2f1e1r1e1n1t1l1y1:

1A1‚1Ä1ô1S1 1A1R1E1 1C2O1L1 1A1N1D1 1C1O1M1E1 1W1I1T1H1 1P1E1R1K1S1 1A1s1 1a1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1,1 1I1 1s1a1w1 1m1y1s1e1l1f1 1a1s1 1a1n1t1i1-1e1s1t1a1b1l1i1s1h1m1e1n1t1,1 1a1n1d1 1I1 1h1a1t1e1d1 1t1e1s1t1s1;1 1I1 1b1a1r1e1l1y1 1m1a1i1n1t1a1i1n1e1d1 1a1 1B1 1a1v1e1r1a1g1e1.1 1I1 1t1h1o1u1g1h1t1 1o1n1l1y1 1n1e1r1d1s1 1s1p1e1n1t1 1w2e1k1e1n1d1s1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1l1i1b1r1a1r1y1 1s1t1u1d1y1i1n1g1.1 1R1e1c1e1n1t1l1y1 1I1 1l1e1a1r1n1e1d1 1t1h1a1t1 1m1y1 1n1i1e1c1e1 1D1a1r1a1,1 1a1 1s1o1p1h1o1m1o1r1e1 1a1t1 1N1e1w1 1Y1o1r1k1 1U1n1i1v1e1r1s1i1t1y1 1w1i1t1h1 1a1 131.171 1G1.1P1.1A1.1 1(1a1n1d1 1a1 1b1o1y1f1r1i1e1n1d1)1,1 1w1a1s1 1o2f1e1r1e1d1 1a1 1w2e1k1 1o1f1 1t1r1a1v1e1l1 1i1n1 1B1u1e1n1o1s1 1A1i1r1e1s1 1a1s1 1p1a1r1t1 1o1f1 1h1e1r1 1h1o1n1o1r1s1 1s1e1m1i1n1a1r1.1 1I1 1w1a1s1 1r1e1t1r1o1a1c1t1i1v1e1l1y1 1e1n1v1i1o1u1s1 1t1o1 1l1e1a1r1n1 1t1h1a1t1 1a1 131.151 1G1.1P1.1A1.1 1o1r1 1h1i1g1h1e1r1 1a1t1 1m1a1n1y1 1s1c1h2o1l1s1 1q1u1a1l1i1f1i1e1s1 1y1o1u1 1f1o1r1 1f1r2e1 1t1r1i1p1s1,1 1s1c1h1o1l1a1r1s1h1i1p1s1,1 1g1r1a1n1t1s1,1 1a1w1a1r1d1s1,1 1p1r1i1v1a1t1e1 1p1a1r1t1i1e1s1 1a1n1d1 1t1o1p1 1i1n1t1e1r1n1s1h1i1p1s1.1 1A1t1 12101,1 1I1 1w1a1s1 1t2o1 1b1u1s1y1 1f1r1e1a1k1i1n1g1 1o1u1t1 1w1h1e1n1 1s1a1i1d1 1b1o1y1f1r1i1e1n1d1 1d1i1s1a2p1e1a1r1e1d1 1(1a1f1t1e1r1 1s1l2e1p1i1n1g1 1w1i1t1h1 1o1n1e1 1o1f1 1s1a1i1d1 1f1r1i1e1n1d1s1)1.1 1S1t1u1d1e1n1t1s1 1c1e1r1t1a1i1n1l1y1 1d1o1n1‚1Ä1ô1t1 1n2e1d1 1t1o1 1s1t1r1i1v1e1 1o1b1s1e2s1i1v1e1l1y1 1f1o1r1 1p1e1r1f1e1c1t1i1o1n1,1 1b1u1t1 1I1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1 1h1a1v1e1 1p1r1i1o1r1i1t1i1z1e1d1 1g1r1a1d1e1s1,1 1n1o1t1 1g1u1y1s1.

1S1H1O1W1 1U1P1 1A1N1D1 1S1P1E1A1K1 1U1P1 1I1f1 1a1 1c1l1a2s1 1w1a1s1 1b1o1r1i1n1g1 1o1r1 1i1t1 1s1n1o1w1e1d1,1 1I1‚1Ä1ô1d1 1s1k1i1p1.1 1M1y1 1r1a1t1i1o1n1a1l1e1 1w1a1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1n1o1b1o1d1y1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 13201-1p1e1r1s1o1n1 1l1e1c1t1u1r1e1 1h1a2l1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1n1o1t1i1c1e1 1a1n1d1 1I1 1c1o1u1l1d1 1g1e1t1 1n1o1t1e1s1 1l1a1t1e1r1.1 1A2t1e1n1d1a1n1c1e1 1b1a1r1e1l1y1 1c1o1u1n1t1e1d1.1 1W1h1e1n1 1I1 1w1e1n1t1,1 1I1‚1Ä1ô1d1 1s1i1t1 1q1u1i1e1t1l1y1 1i1n1 1b1a1c1k1.1 1Y1e1t1 1a1s1 1a1 1t1e1a1c1h1e1r1,1 1I1 1s2e1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1s1 1w1h1o1 1c1o1m1e1 1w2e1k1l1y1,1 1s1i1t1 1i1n1 1f1r1o1n1t1,1 1a1n1d1 1a1s1k1 1a1n1d1 1a1n1s1w1e1r1 1q1u1e1s1t1i1o1n1s1 1g1e1t1 1h1i1g1h1e1r1 1g1r1a1d1e1s1 1a1n1d1 1f1r1a1n1k1l1y1,1 1p1r1e1f1e1r1e1n1t1i1a1l1 1t1r1e1a1t1m1e1n1t1.1 1A1f1t1e1r1 11151 1w2e1k1s1,1 1I1 1b1a1r1e1l1y1 1k1n1o1w1 1t1h1e1 1a1b1s1e1n1t2e1s1 1o1r1 1a1n1y1o1n1e1 1S1n1a1p1c1h1a2t1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1t1e1r1m1 1a1w1a1y1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1i1P1h1o1n1e1s1.1 1I1t1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1n1o1t1 1j1u1s1t1 1t1h1a1t1 1t1h1e1s1e1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1s1 1f1l1u1s1h1 1$13201 1d1o1w1n1 1t1h1e1 1t1o1i1l1e1t1 1e1v1e1r1y1 1t1i1m1e1 1t1h1e1y1 1m1i2s1 1m1y1 1c1l1a2s1;1 1p1a1r1t1i1c1i1p1a1t1i1n1g1 1c1a1n1 1a1c1t1u1a2l1y1 1l1e1a1d1 1t1o1 1p1a1y1o2f1s1.1 1I1 1r1e1w1a1r1d1 1t1h1o1s1e1 1w1h1o1 1t1r1y1 1h1a1r1d1e1r1 1w1i1t1h1 1r1e1c1o2m1e1n1d1a1t1i1o1n1s1,1 1r1e1f1e1r1e1n1c1e1s1,1 1p1r1o1f1e2s1i1o1n1a1l1 1c1o1n1t1a1c1t1s1 1a1n1d1 1e1n1c1o1u1r1a1g1e1m1e1n1t1.

1C1L1A2S1 1C1O2N1E1C1T1I1O1N1S1 1C1A1N1 1L1A1U1N1C1H1 1Y1O1U1R1 1C1A1R2E1R1 1A1s1 1a1n1 1u1n1d1e1r1g1r1a1d1,1 1I1 1r1a1r1e1l1y1 1v1i1s1i1t1e1d1 1m1y1 1p1r1o1f1e2s1o1r1s1 1d1u1r1i1n1g1 1o2f1i1c1e1 1h1o1u1r1s1.1 1I1 1d1i1d1n1‚1Ä1ô1t1 1w1a1n1t1 1t1o1 1a2n1o1y1 1t1e1a1c1h1e1r1s1 1w1i1t1h1 1w1h1a1t1 1I1 1c1o1n1s1i1d1e1r1e1d1 1t1r1i1v1i1a1l1i1t1y1.1 1B1e1s1i1d1e1s1,1 1I1 1t1h1o1u1g1h1t1 1I1 1k1n1e1w1 1e1v1e1r1y1t1h1i1n1g1 1a1l1r1e1a1d1y1.1 1I1n1 1g1r1a1d1u1a1t1e1 1s1c1h2o1l1,1 1o1n1 1t1h1e1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1h1a1n1d1,1 1I1 1w1e1n1t1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1r1e1a1d1i1n1g1s1 1o1f1 1a1 1p1r1o1f1e2s1o1r1 1I1 1a1d1m1i1r1e1d1.1 1E1v1e1n1t1u1a2l1y1,1 1I1‚1Ä1ô1d1 1g1o1 1t1o1 1h1i1s1 1o2f1i1c1e1 1j1u1s1t1 1t1o1 1v1e1n1t1.1 1O1n1c1e1,1 1a1f1t1e1r1 1I1 1c1o1m1p1l1a1i1n1e1d1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1a1 1d1e1a1d1-1e1n1d1 1j1o1b1,1 1h1e1 1r1e1c1o2m1e1n1d1e1d1 1m1e1 1f1o1r1 1a1 1p1o1s1i1t1i1o1n1 1a1t1 1T1h1e1 1N1e1w1 1Y1o1r1k1e1r1,1 1j1u1m1p1-1s1t1a1r1t1i1n1g1 1m1y1 1c1a1r2e1r1.

1N1e1w1s1l1e2t1e1r1 1S1i1g1n1 1U1p1C1o1n1t1i1n1u1e1 1r1e1a1d1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1m1a1i1n1 1s1t1o1r1y

1Y1o1u1 1a1g1r2e1 1t1o1 1r1e1c1e1i1v1e1 1o2c1a1s1i1o1n1a1l1 1u1p1d1a1t1e1s1 1a1n1d1 1s1p1e1c1i1a1l1 1o2f1e1r1s1 1f1o1r1 1T1h1e1 1N1e1w1 1Y1o1r1k1 1T1i1m1e1s1'1s1 1p1r1o1d1u1c1t1s1 1a1n1d1 1s1e1r1v1i1c1e1s1.

1S2E1 1S1A1M1P1L1E1 1P1R1I1V1A1C1Y1 1P1O1L1I1C1Y1 1O1P1T1 1O1U1T1 1O1R1 1C1O1N1T1A1C1T1 1U1S1 1A1N1Y1T1I1M1E
1B1u1t1 1i1t1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1n1o1t1 1j1u1s1t1 1y1o1u1r1 1p1r1o1f1e2s1o1r1s1 1w1h1o1 1w1i2l1 1h1e1l1p1 1y1o1u1r1 1l1i1f1e1 1t1r1a1j1e1c1t1o1r1y1.1 1S1e1v1e1r1a1l1 1c1l1a2s1m1a1t1e1s1 1o1f1 1m1i1n1e1 1f1r1o1m1 1g1r1a1d1u1a1t1e1 1s1c1h2o1l1 1w1o1u1n1d1 1u1p1 1w1o1r1k1i1n1g1 1a1s1 1e1d1i1t1o1r1s1 1a1t1 1o1t1h1e1r1 1p1u1b1l1i1c1a1t1i1o1n1s1,1 1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1y1 1h1a1v1e1 1s1i1n1c1e1 1h1i1r1e1d1 1m1e1 1f1o1r1 1f1r2e1l1a1n1c1e1 1w1o1r1k1.1 1Y1e1a1r1s1 1l1a1t1e1r1,1 1I1‚1Ä1ô1v1e1 1h1e1l1p1e1d1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1s1 1a1n1d1 1c1o2l1e1a1g1u1e1s1 1w1h1e1r1e1 1I1 1t1e1a1c1h1,1 1a1t1 1t1h1e1 1N1e1w1 1S1c1h2o1l1 1a1n1d1 1N1e1w1 1Y1o1r1k1 1U1n1i1v1e1r1s1i1t1y1,1 1l1a1n1d1 1j1o1b1s1,1 1g1e1t1 1p1u1b1l1i1s1h1e1d1 1a1n1d1 1m2e1t1 1w1i1t1h1 1e1d1i1t1o1r1s1 1a1n1d1 1a1g1e1n1t1s1.

1P1R1O1F1E2S1O1R1S1 1A1R1E1 1P1E1O1P1L1E1,1 1T2O1 1A1s1 1a1 1t1e1a1c1h1e1r1,1 1I1‚1Ä1ô1v1e1 1k1e1p1t1 1a2l1 1t1h1e1 1l1e2t1e1r1s1,1 1c1a1r1d1s1 1a1n1d1 1p1o1e1m1s1 1o1f1 1g1r1a1t1i1t1u1d1e1 1I1‚1Ä1ô1v1e1 1b2e1n1 1s1e1n1t1.1 1I1t1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1n1i1c1e1 1t1o1 1b1e1 1a2p1r1e1c1i1a1t1e1d1,1 1a1n1d1 1i1t1 1m1a1k1e1s1 1a1 1l1a1s1t1i1n1g1 1i1m1p1r1e2s1i1o1n1.1 1A1f1t1e1r1 1o1n1e1 1o1f1 1m1y1 1i1n1t1r1o1 1s1e2s1i1o1n1s1,1 1a1 1f1r1e1s1h1m1a1n1 1f1r1o1m1 1I1d1a1h1o1 1b1l1u1r1t1e1d1 1o1u1t1:1 1‚1Ä1ú1A1w1e1s1o1m1e1 1c1l1a2s1!1 1I1t1‚1Ä1ô1s1 1l1i1k1e1 1y1o1u1 1s1t1u1c1k1 1m1y1 1f1i1n1g1e1r1s1 1i1n1 1a1 1l1i1g1h1t1 1s1o1c1k1e1t1.1‚1Ä1ù1 1I1 1l1a1u1g1h1e1d1 1a1n1d1 1i1n1v1i1t1e1d1 1h1e1r1 1t1o1 1s1p2e1d1 1w1a1l1k1 1w1i1t1h1 1m1e1 1a1r1o1u1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1l1o1c1a1l1 1p1a1r1k1 1‚1Ä1î1 1a1n1 1a1c1t1i1v1i1t1y1 1I1 1t1a1k1e1 1p1a1r1t1 1i1n1 1n1i1g1h1t1l1y1 1a1s1 1a1 1s1o1r1t1 1o1f1 1a1c1t1i1v1e1 1o2f1i1c1e1 1h1o1u1r1s1 1‚1Ä1î1 1a1n1d1 1w1e1 1w1o1r1k1s1h1o2p1e1d1 1i1d1e1a1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1l1e1d1 1t1o1 1h1e1r1 1f1i1r1s1t1 1b2o1k1.1 1A1n1d1 1w1h1e1n1 1a1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1 1c1o1n1f1i1d1e1d1 1s1h1e1 1w1a1s1 1d1y1i1n1g1 1t1o1 1t1a1k1e1 1a1n1o1t1h1e1r1 1c1l1a2s1 1w1i1t1h1 1m1e1 1b1u1t1 1h1a1d1 1l1o1s1t1 1h1e1r1 1f1i1n1a1n1c1i1a1l1 1a1i1d1,1 1I1 1l1e1t1 1h1e1r1 1a1u1d1i1t1.1 1I1n1 1r1e1t1r1o1s1p1e1c1t1,1 1I1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1 1h1a1v1e1 1b2e1n1 1m1o1r1e1 1o1p1e1n1 1w1i1t1h1 1t1h1e1 1i1n1s1t1r1u1c1t1o1r1s1 1I1 1a1d1m1i1r1e1d1.

1C1o1n1t1i1n1u1e1 1r1e1a1d1i1n1g1 1t1h1e1 1m1a1i1n1 1s1t1o1r1y

1S1m1a1r1t1e1r1 1L1i1v1i1n1g
1S1t1o1r1i1e1s1 1t1o1 1h1e1l1p1 1y1o1u1 1u1n1d1e1r1s1t1a1n1d1 1t1h1e1 1w1o1r1l1d1 1‚1Ä1ì1 1a1n1d1 1m1a1k1e1 1t1h1e1 1m1o1s1t1 1o1f1 1i1t1.

1S1o1 1b1a1s1i1c1a2l1y1 1t1h1e1 1a1u1t1h1o1r1 1i1s1 1t1e2l1i1n1g1 1u1s1 1t1h1a1t1 1w1h1o1 1y1o1u1 1k1n1o1w1 1i1s1 1m1o1r1e1 1i1m1p1o1r1t1a1n1t1 1t1h1a1n1 1w1h1a1t1 1y1o1u1 1k1n1o1w1.1 1W1o1r1s1e1,1 1d1e1f1e1n1d1i1n1g1 1h1e1r1 1s1t1a1n1c1e1.1 1Y1u1c1k1.

1C1h1r1i1s1t1y1 1O1c1t1o1b1e1r1 11191,1 12101117
1G1r1e1a1t1 1a1d1v1i1c1e1 1t1h1a1t1 1I1 1w1i1s1h1 1I1 1h1a1d1 1t1a1k1e1n1 1b1a1c1k1 1i1n1 1c1o2l1e1g1e4.1 1b1u1t1 1d1e1s1p1i1t1e1 1y1o1u1r1 1p1a1s1t1 1‚1Ä1ú1m1i1s1t1a1k1e1s1‚1Ä1ù1 1y1o1u1 1s2e1m1 1t1o1 1h1a1v1e1 1w1e2l1 1f1o1r1 1y1o1u1r1s1e1l1f1!

1B1 1W1e1i1d1n1e1r1 1O1c1t1o1b1e1r1 11191,1 12101117
1I1 1t1h1i1n1k1 1p1a1r1e1n1t1s1 1w1h1o1 1w1a1n1t1 1t1o1 1p1r1i1n1t1 1t1h1i1s1 1o1u1t1 1f1o1r1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1k1i1d1s1 1s1h1o1u1l1d1 1s1a1v1e1 1t1h1e1 1t1r2e1s1.1 1T1h1i1s1 1p1r1e1a1c1h1y1 1a1r1t1i1c1l1e1 1i1s1 1c1o1m1i1n1g1 1f1r1o1m1 1s1o1m1e1o1n1e1 1w1h1o1 1d1o1e1s1n1'1t3.

1S2E1 1A2L1 1C1O2M1E1N1T1S
1F1I1N1D1 1Y1O1U1R1 1P1R1O1F1E2S1O1R1S1 1O1N1 1S1O1C1I1A1L1 1M1E1D1I1A1 1I1 1a1n1s1w1e1r1 1a2l1 1e1m1a1i1l1s1,1 1a1n1d1 1w1h1i1l1e1 1I1 1m1a1y1 1n1o1t1 1a2c1e1p1t1 1a2l1 1f1r1i1e1n1d1 1r1e1q1u1e1s1t1s1,1 1I1 1r1e1s1p1o1n1d1 1t1o1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1s1 1w1h1o1 1f1o2l1o1w1 1m1e1 1o1n1 1F1a1c1e1b2o1k1,1 1T1w1i2t1e1r1 1a1n1d1 1I1n1s1t1a1g1r1a1m1.1 1M1o1r1e1 1i1m1p1o1r1t1a1n1t1,1 1s1o1c1i1a1l1 1m1e1d1i1a1 1i1s1 1w1h1e1r1e1 1I1 1p1o1s1t1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1p1a1n1e1l1s1,1 1j1o1b1 1o1p1e1n1i1n1g1s1 1a1n1d1 1f1r2e1l1a1n1c1e1 1w1o1r1k1.1 1C1h1e1c1k1i1n1g1 1o1u1t1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1s1‚1Ä1ô1 1s1o1c1i1a1l1 1m1e1d1i1a1 1f2e1d1s1 1a1l1s1o1 1a2l1o1w1s1 1m1e1 1t1o1 1s2e1 1n1e1w1 1s1i1d1e1s1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1p1e1r1s1o1n1a1l1i1t1i1e1s1.1 1N1a1k1e1d1 1b2e1r1 1p1o1n1g1 1p1h1o1t1o1s1 1m1a1y1 1n1o1t1 1i1m1p1r1e2s1,1 1b1u1t1 1w1i2t1y1 1p1o1s1t1s1 1a1n1d1 1o1r1i1g1i1n1a1l1 1i1d1e1a1s1 1d1o1.1 1S1e1v1e1r1a1l1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1s1 1h1a1v1e1 1d1e1v1e1l1o1p1e1d1 1b2o1k1 1p1r1o1j1e1c1t1s1 1f1r1o1m1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1b1l1o1g1s1 1a1n1d1 1I1n1s1t1a1g1r1a1m1 1p1a1g1e1s1,1 1a1n1d1 1I1 1p1r1o1m1o1t1e1 1t1h1e1i1r1 1w1o1r1k1,1 1c1h1a1r1i1t1i1e1s1 1a1n1d1 1e1v1e1n1t1s1 1o1n1 1m1y1 1o1w1n1 1s1o1c1i1a1l1 1m1e1d1i1a1 1f2e1d1s1.1 1Y1o1u1 1n1e1v1e1r1 1k1n1o1w1 1i1f1 1t1h1e1 1c1o2l1e1g1e1 1p1r1e1s1i1d1e1n1t1 1o1r1 1y1o1u1r1 1p1r1o1f1e2s1o1r1 1m1i1g1h1t1 1r1e1t1w2e1t1 1o1r1 1r1e1p1o1s1t1 1y1o1u1r1 1w1o1r1k1.

1Y1O1U1 1C1A1N1 1S1O1C1I1A1L1I1Z1E1 1B1E2T1E1R1 1S1O1B1E1R1 1D1r1i1n1k1i1n1g1 1a1n1d1 1s1m1o1k1i1n1g1 1e1a1s1e1d1 1m1y1 1s1o1c1i1a1l1 1a1n1x1i1e1t1y1 1a1n1d1 1s2e1m1e1d1 1l1i1k1e1 1f1u1n1.1 1U1n1t1i1l1 1I1 1c1o1u1l1d1n1‚1Ä1ô1t1 1s1t1o1p1.1 1G1e2t1i1n1g1 1c1l1e1a1n1 1‚1Ä1î1 1s1m1o1k1e1-1t1o1k1e1-1a1l1c1o1h1o1l1-1f1r2e1 1‚1Ä1î1 1l1e1d1 1t1o1 1a1 1h1u1g1e1 1u1p1s1w1i1n1g1 1i1n1 1m1y1 1l1i1f1e1.1 1I1n1s1t1e1a1d1 1o1f1 1p1a1r1t1y1i1n1g1,1 1I1‚1Ä1ô1d1 1d1o1 1m1o1v1i1e1 1n1i1g1h1t1s1,1 1d1a1n1c1i1n1g1,1 1y1o1g1a1,1 1a1e1r1o1b1i1c1s1 1c1l1a2s1e1s1 1a1n1d1 1r1e1a1d1i1n1g1s1 1w1i1t1h1 1f1r1i1e1n1d1s1 1a1n1d1 1d1a1t1e1s1.1 1I1 1w1a1s1 1s1u1r1p1r1i1s1e1d1 1t1o1 1s2e1 1t1h1a1t1 1m1y1 1w1o1r1k1 1g1r1e1a1t1l1y1 1i1m1p1r1o1v1e1d1,1 1a1s1 1d1i1d1 1m1y1 1r1e1l1a1t1i1o1n1s1h1i1p1s1.1 1I1 1k1n1o1w1 1m1a1n1y1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1s1 1w1h1o1 1g1e1t1 1i1n1t1o1 1b1i1g1 1t1r1o1u1b1l1e1 1w1h1e1n1 1t1h1e1y1 1a1r1e1 1u1n1d1e1r1 1t1h1e1 1i1n1f1l1u1e1n1c1e1,1 1a1n1d1 1I1 1s1t1i2l1 1w1o2r1y1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1w1h1a1t1 1I1 1m1i2s1e1d1,1 1w1a1s1t1i1n1g1 1s1o1 1m1u1c1h1 1t1i1m1e1 1w1a1s1t1e1d1.

1Y1O1U1‚1Ä1ô1R1E1 1N1O1T1 1S1T1U1C1K1 1D1o1n1‚1Ä1ô1t1 1b1e1 1a1f1r1a1i1d1 1t1o1 1a1s1k1 1f1o1r1 1e1m1o1t1i1o1n1a1l1 1s1u2p1o1r1t1.1 1I1t1 1w1a1s1 1a1 1g1r1a1d1u1a1t1e1 1s1c1h2o1l1 1p1r1o1f1e2s1o1r1 1w1h1o1 1r1e1c1o2m1e1n1d1e1d1 1m1y1 1f1i1r1s1t1 1t1h1e1r1a1p1i1s1t1 1t1o1 1m1e1:1 1S1h1e1 1w1a1s1 1a1 1f1a1n1t1a1s1t1i1c1 1l1i1s1t1e1n1e1r1 1w1h1o1 1c1h1a1r1g1e1d1 1o1n1 1a1 1s1l1i1d1i1n1g1 1s1c1a1l1e1.1 1T1h1e1r1a1p1y1 1c1a1n1 1b1e1 1c1h1e1a1p1,1 1f1u1n1 1a1n1d1 1e1a1s1i1l1y1 1a1v1a1i1l1a1b1l1e1 1‚1Ä1î1 1n1o1t1 1t1o1 1m1e1n1t1i1o1n1 1l1i1f1e1s1a1v1i1n1g1.

1A1n1d1 1i1f1 1i1t1 1t1u1r1n1s1 1o1u1t1 1y1o1u1‚1Ä1ô1r1e1 1i1n1 1t1h1e1 1w1r1o1n1g1 1s1c1h2o1l1,1 1d1o1n1‚1Ä1ô1t1 1w1o2r1y1.1 1A1 1t1h1i1r1d1 1o1f1 1c1o2l1e1g1e1 1s1t1u1d1e1n1t1s1 1t1r1a1n1s1f1e1r1 1b1e1f1o1r1e1 1g1r1a1d1u1a1t1i1n1g1.1 1I1f1 1y1o1u1‚1Ä1ô1r1e1 1u1n1h1a2p1y1 1o1r1 1n1o1t1 1t1h1r1i1v1i1n1g1 1a1t1 1y1o1u1r1 1s1c1h2o1l1,1 1t1a1k1e1 1t1h1e1 1l1o1n1g1 1v1i1e1w1.1 1I1 1c1o1u1l1d1n1‚1Ä1ô1t1 1h1a1v1e1 1m1a1d1e1 1i1t1 1i1n1 1M1a1n1h1a2t1a1n1 1a1s1 1a1n1 1u1n1d1e1r1g1r1a1d1u1a1t1e1,1 1b1u1t1 1f1o1u1r1 1y1e1a1r1s1 1l1a1t1e1r1,1 1g1r1a1d1u1a1t1e1 1s1c1h2o1l1 1a1t1 1N1e1w1 1Y1o1r1k1 1U1n1i1v1e1r1s1i1t1y1 1o2f1e1r1e1d1 1m1e1 1a1 1c1h1a1n1c1e1 1t1o1 1l1i1v1e1 1i1n1 1m1y1 1d1r1e1a1m1 1c1i1t1y1.1 1I1t1 1t2o1k1 1m1e1 1o1n1l1y1 1t1h1r2e1 1d1e1c1a1d1e1s1 1o1f1 1w1o1r1k1 1t1o1 1m1a1k1e1 1i1t1 1t1o1 1t1h1e1 1I1v1y1 1L1e1a1g1u1e1 1‚1Ä1î1 1t1o1 1t1e1a1c1h1 1o1n1e1 1c1l1a2s1,1 1a1t1 1l1e1a1s1t1.
